plot: "Two boys work the familiar trick of placing a brick under a hat to catch the unwary passer-by. The success of the trick makes a very laughable scene."
title: Boys Will Be Boys
plot_es: "Two boys work the familiar trick of placing a brick under a hat to catch the unwary passer-by. The success of the trick makes a very laughable scene."
plot_en: "Two boys work the familiar trick of placing a brick under a hat to catch the unwary passer-by. The success of the trick makes a very laughable scene."
